measure.name: Add Controls for Ground Heat Exchanger with no Supplemental Heating or Cooling
measure.description: Allows a ground heat exchanger (borefield) to operate without supplemental heating or cooling.
measure.modeler_description: Adds a SetpointManager:FollowGroundTemperature setpoint manager to the specified node. This is typically used when you have a loop with a ground heat exchanger (borefield) but don't have any supplemental heating or cooling on the loop. Also adds deep ground temperatures, as specified in the "deep_ground_temps.idf" file in the /resources folder of this measure.
